overview: Stadaconé is the native name of Québec City (meaning "where the river narrows") and much of this 2010 release from ESK Media is shot in that region.  Tight editing, a fresh soundtrack and ridiculously creative park and urban jibbing highlight this East Coast based movie. Quebec skiers know how to shred! Shot in High Definition and directed by Nicolas Brassard-Asselin.
title: Stadaconé
